about_the_game:
Rune Legacy Idle is a role-playing game with idle mechanics set in a classic high-fantasy world. Battle mythical monsters, train various skills, and challenge your friends to duels. Alternatively, team up with them for epic adventures. Enjoy an idle RPG experience where your journey never stops, even when you're away. Start your journey and craft your legend.





Create your own hero and customize them to your liking. Tailor your hero's abilities to match your gameplay style, whether as a powerful warrior, a cunning rogue, or a skilled mage. Train your hero in specific disciplines, and enhance their strengths. Enjoy a game where your personalized hero evolves and grows, reflecting your strategic choices and playstyle throughout the adventure.





Gather resources and craft. Chop wood in lush forests, mine precious ores, or fish in serene waters. Use these resources to craft powerful weapons and armours. Whether forging legendary armor or preparing delicious meals, Rune Legacy Idle offers countless opportunities to master your craft and thrive.





Team up with friends and embark on adventures together. Share experience, support each other in quests, and tackle challenges as a united force. Work together to overcome difficult encounters and share the spoils of victory. Your teamwork will be key to success.





Engage in online combat against other players or friends. Test your skills in intense battles and rise through the ranks. Adapt to your opponents' strategies and claim victory in the arena. Prove your prowess, refine your tactics, and win. Earn rewards and recognition as you dominate the leaderboards in this epic world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @2.3 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 – 8600K (3.6 GHz) / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X (3.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 (2GB) / AMD Radeon RX 570 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
